skills.name: Cutting Force: Kienzle Model
skills.description: Empirical cutting force model using specific cutting force

skills.description: Analytical model based on shear plane theory

skills.description: Predictive model considering strain rate and temperature

skills.name: Cutting Force: Mechanistic Model
capabilities: Calculate cutting forces using Mechanistic Model

capabilities: Calculate cutting forces using FEM Analysis
